description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application. It handles incoming HTTP requests, distinguishes between bot and browser requests, and renders the app server-side with streaming responses. It manages CORS headers and uses React's server rendering utilities.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function that processes an HTTP request, sets headers, detects bots with 'isbot', and delegates to specific handlers for bots or browsers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering and streaming response generation for bot requests using React's renderToPipeableStream.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server rendering for browser requests, generating a streamed HTML response.
